name: Puzzle Solitaire!
description:
Do you like to play Solitaire? Are you tired of the same old original gameplay or the other basic versions like Klondike, Spider, Pyramid, Freecell and Blitz that no longer amaze you? Then prepare to be amazed as we have just the card game for you! Come play, compete and win in the trending new, free Solitaire game, Puzzle Solitaire!

Puzzle Solitaire is a brand new twist on the classic Solitaire gameplay you've come to love but with an amazing, new twist that slices together the fun of puzzle games! One gameplay, twice the fun!

Don't get caught in your love triangle between choosing Solitaire or Puzzles because now you can have them both! If you thought Blitz, Klondike, Pyramid, Freecell or Spider Solitaire was a challenge, then try taking on the strategy of Solitaire and the fun of puzzles at the same time!

Here's just a few reasons why you'll love to play Puzzle Solitaire!

- Play Puzzle Solitaire and win prizes that will amaze you every time!
- Play levels on the go. Whether offline or not, the fun never stops!
- All the best things you love about Solitaire, Klondike, Pyramid and Spider but now served with large slices of puzzle games on top!
- Compete and win to scale your way to the top of the Leaderboards! Challenge your friends and amaze them with your scores!
- New fun bonuses that will never cease to amaze you, are waiting for you in Puzzle Solitaire every day! Come and discover them!

Come join the trending ride and bring your Solitaire strategy while you train to take on new challenges with the puzzle levels! Imagine a game you love like Spider Solitaire, Klondike, Pyramid or Freecell but even more amazing!

Puzzle Solitaire is full of new features and levels that will start easy and scale in difficulty to train your brain and keep you on your toes! Unlock exciting new boosters that can help you rocket your way through hard to beat levels!

If you've played infamous triangle of Klondike, Freecell or Spider Solitaire then there's no reason not to try the fun new twist of Puzzle Solitaire that slices together the fun of Solitaire and puzzles!

Download Puzzle Solitaire now, for Free, and start to blitz your way through new levels to win bigger prizes that scale the further you go! Your adventure starts today with Puzzle Solitaire!
